channel.title: Need help Server status wont let me post my server any more! wtf?
channel.description:
Yeah the server status page is messed up, i get an error now saying
[code]You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'trunescape3.no-ip.org' OR `ipfield` = '71.35.226.22'' at line 1 [/code]
What the heck does that mean? It never did that before...whats wrong?
Please help :|

item.title: Need help Server status wont let me post my server any more! wtf?

item.description:

Read the sticky in the Questions section.
